Tobi [[Earth Release: Hiding Like a Mole Technique|burrows]] underground and circles the opponent with many mines. While burrowing out, he is stuck and struck by the blast, resulting in him being knocked over with fire on his cloak. Though Tobi is caught in the explosion, no damage is inflicted on him as a result of this attack.
